welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dasmarinas, Philippines! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning natural beauty. Make sure to explore and enjoy everything our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving international and domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout all terminals, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
